item.title: Report X-2024070594
item.description:
Report X-2024070594

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-11T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-08
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box is marked with a corrosive diamond. The box contains 4X1gal bottles of Ecolab Ecotemp Phase 1 Detergent. The top of the box is wet from the leaking 2X1gal bottles. 2 bottles had the caps a little loose and the seals under the caps are broken allowing them to leak. The other 2 are soiled from the leakage.

item.title: Report X-2024070308
item.description:
Report X-2024070308

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-08T18:15:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-03
  • City: ORANGE
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF Freight
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Upon moving a pallet containing four black plastic jerricans they noticed that the pallet was leaking. Chris stated that one of the jerricans had a corner that was damaged. Chris stated that he is unsure how the jerrican became damaged. Chris stated that trailer 500593 arrived from 042/CAR. Chris st ated that four ounces of UN1760 leaked on the floor of the trailer and on the dock. ~
